title: Executive Order 5738-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Louise A. Gallivan
content: Mrs. Louise A. Gallivan may be appointed, as Grade CAF-1 Clerk in the Boston Regional Office of the Veterans' Administration without regard to the requirements of the civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5738-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Louise A. Gallivan Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361310
